name: Doggy io (opoly)
description:
Doggy io is a tail-waggingly good Board Game! It's a playful celebration of our wonderful canine friends! Learn about Dogs as you travel and buy properties. Travel the Doggy io board as you collect and trade different dogs & properties. Create a fun strategic opoly-style board game for any occasion your photos call for while celebrating man's best friend.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
